comment.language: The response to the Pauline Epistle is chanted:

text.language: Pih~mot gar m~Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: efe~swpi nem peka~gion p~neuma: pa[oic n~iwt ettai/out n~ar,ie~reuc papa abba (nim)
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your saintly spirit, my lord, the honored father, the archpriest, Pope Abba (...).

language.div: Anugerah dari Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, menyertai rohmu yang suci, Tuanku, bapa yang terhormat… imam besar... Baba/Abba (...).

text.language: نعمة ربنا يسوع المسيح تكون مع روحك الطاهرة يا سيدى الأب المكرم رئيس الكهنة البابا أنبا (...)

comment.language: In the presence of a metropolitan, the following is added.
In the presence of a metropolitan, the following is added.
وإن كان حاضراً مطران فيزاد له:

text.language: And our father the metropolitan, Abba (...).

comment.language: In the presence of a bishop, the following is added.
In the presence of a bishop, the following is added.

text.language: And our father the bishop, Abba (...).

comment.language: In the presence of more than one metropolitan, the following is added.
In the presence of more than one metropolitan, the following is added.
وإن كان حاضراً معه مطارنة فيقال:

text.language: And our fathers the metropolitans who are with us.
Dan para bapa Metropolitan kami yang hadir bersama kita.

comment.language: In the presence of more than one bishop, the following is added:
In the presence of more than one bishop, the following is added:

text.language: And our fathers the bishops who are with us.
Dan para bapa Uskup kami yang hadir bersama kami.

comment.language: وبعد أية جملة من الجمل السابقة يكمل قائلاً:
